title: Ep. 526 - A Majority Of Americans Say America Is Racist. They're Wrong.
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a new poll finds that a majority of Americans think our country is systemically racist. They’re wrong, of course. Also Five Headlines including the continued blood bath in Chicago and the Left’s latest discovery that BMI — the body mass index — is actually racist. And in our Daily Cancellation, I will be canceling the Trump campaign. I’ll explain why.
